data.name: sqlAllInspections
data.value: SELECT * from RELADMIN.TBLECINSPECTIONTEMPLATE where insptempnumber={0}

data.name: sqlAllStandardTemplates
data.value: SELECT a.insptempnumber as INSPTASKID,a.TASKDESC,a.Action,a.TOOLS,a.TARGET,a.UPPERLIMIT,a.LOWERLIMIT,a.REFERENCEMATERIAL,a.RESPONSE,a.OPFLAG,a.FREQDESC,a.ROUTEDESC,a.EQUIPCLASS,a.EQUIPTYPE from reladmin.ecinspecttemp_dtl_vw a

data.name: sqlArea
data.value: Select Distinct SubArea From tblRISuperArea order by SubArea

data.name: sqlBusUnit
data.value: Select Distinct RISuperArea From tblRISuperArea Order By RISuperArea

data.name: sqlBusUnitBySite
data.value: Select Distinct RISuperArea From tblRISuperArea a,refsite b where a.bustype=b.bustype and b.siteid='{0}' Order By RISuperArea

data.name: sqlCurrentInspection
data.value: SELECT TASKDESC,Taskid, Action, TOOLS, TARGET,UPPERLIMIT, LOWERLIMIT, REFERENCEMATERIAL , RESPONSE,OPFLAG, FREQDESC, ROUTEDESC,ROUTESEQID,ROUTETYPE,FREQCODE,EQUIPCLASS,EQUIPTYPE FROM reladmin.ecroute_dtl_vw where Equipmentid='{0}' and siteid='{1}'

data.name: sqlCurrentInspectionExcel
data.value: SELECT distinct SiteName as "Facility", EquipmentID as "Functional Location", EquipmentDesc as "Equipment Description" ,equipclass as "Equipment Class", equiptype as "Equipment Type",criticality as "Criticality" , TASKDESC as "Task Description",Taskid as "Task ID", Action as "Action", TOOLS as "Tools", TARGET as "Target",UPPERLIMIT as "Upper Limit", LOWERLIMIT as "Lower Limit", REFERENCEMATERIAL as "Reference Material" , RESPONSE as "Response",OPFLAG as "UP?", FREQDESC as "Frequency Description", ROUTEDESC as "Route Description",ROUTETYPE as "Route Type",FREQCODE as "Frequency Code",ROUTESEQID FROM reladmin.ecroute_dtl_vw a,refSite c where a.EquipmentID='{0}' and a.siteid='{1}' and a.siteid = c.siteid

data.name: sqlDefaultDivision
data.value: select DIVISION from REFSITE,REFEMPLOYEE WHERE REFSITE.SITEID = REFEMPLOYEE.SITEID AND USERNAME='{0}'

data.name: sqlEditTemplates
data.value: SELECT A.Taskid,A.TASKDESC, A.Action, A.TOOLS, A.TARGET,A.UPPERLIMIT, A.LOWERLIMIT, A.REFERENCEMATERIAL , A.RESPONSE,A.OPFLAG, a.FREQDESC, a.ROUTEDESC,a.ROUTESEQID,a.FREQCODE,a.ROUTETYPE,a.EQUIPCLASS,a.EQUIPTYPE,a.Equipmentid,a.siteid FROM reladmin.ecroute_dtl_vw A where a.Equipmentid='{0}' and a.siteid='{1}' and a.routeseqid='{2}'

data.name: sqlEquipClass
data.value: select distinct equipclass as equipclass from refequipment where equipclass <> ' ' order by equipclass

data.name: sqlEquipSize
data.value: select distinct equipsize from tblecinspectiontemplate where equipsize <>' ' order by equipsize

data.name: sqlEquipType
data.value: select distinct equiptype from refequipment where equiptype <> ' ' order by equiptype

data.name: sqlFacility
data.value: Select Distinct Siteid, SiteName From refSite Where BusType = 'PM' and Inactive_Flag = 'N' Order By SiteName

data.name: sqlFreqDesc
data.value: select distinct Freqcode,FreqDesc from RELADMIN.REFFREQUENCY order by FREQDESC

data.name: sqlInspectionEquipmentClass
data.value: SELECT distinct a.EQUIPClass from reladmin.ecinspecttemp_dtl_vw a where a.EQUIPClass <> ' ' order by a.EQUIPClass

data.name: sqlInspectionHeader
data.value: SELECT distinct '{2}' as "Facility" ,EquipmentID as "Functional Location", EquipmentDesc as "Equipment Description" ,equipclass as "Equipment Class", equiptype as "Equipment Type",criticality as "Criticality" FROM refEquipment,refSite Where EquipmentID='{0}' and refequipment.siteid='{1}'

data.name: sqlLine
data.value: Select distinct area from refsitearea order by area

data.name: sqlLineBySite
data.value: Select distinct area from refsitearea a,refsite b where a.siteid=b.siteid and b.siteid='{0}' order by area

data.name: sqlManufacturer
data.value: select distinct mfg from tblecinspectiontemplate where mfg<>' ' order by mfg

data.name: sqlModel
data.value: select distinct model from tblecinspectiontemplate where model<>' ' order by model

data.name: sqlPPRMachines
data.value: SELECT MACH_NUMBER,TRIM(MACH_DESCRIPTION) || '(' || MACH_NUMBER || ')' MACH_DESCRIPTION FROM MACHINE WHERE MACH_NUMBER <> ' ' AND MACH_TYPE <> ' ' ORDER BY MACH_DESCRIPTION,MACH_NUMBER

data.name: sqlPPRReasons
data.value: select distinct ReportTitle,reportparametertype,ReportParameters from reladmin.refreportdropdowns where reporttitle='Paper Downtime' and reportparametertype in ('Downtime','Paper Loss','Slab Loss') order by reportparametertype,ReportParameters

data.name: sqlPPRSite
data.value: SELECT DISTINCT rtrim(s.site) site,substr(name,1,instr(name,',')-1) name FROM SITE.APPLICATION A, SITE.HOST H, SITE.SITE S WHERE A.HOSTNAME = H.HOSTNAME AND H.SITE = S.SITE AND (A.HOSTNAME LIKE '%oms%') AND S.ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY name

data.name: sqlReportList
data.value: select distinct ReportTitle as ReportTitle from reladmin.REFREPORTDROPDOWNS order by ReportTitle

data.name: sqlReportSortList
data.value: Select distinct r1.reporttitle,REPORTSORTVALUE,REPORTNAME,SORTVALUEORDER,INACTIVE_FLAG from reladmin.refreportdropdowns r1, reladmin.refreportdetail r2 where r1.reporttitle=r2.reporttitle ORDER BY SORTVALUEORDER

data.name: sqlRouteDescription
data.value: select distinct routetype,routedesc from reladmin.REFROUTETYPE order by routedesc

data.name: sqlStandardInspectionAllExcel
data.value: SELECT distinct SiteName as "Facility", a.insptempnumber as INSPTASKID,a.TASKDESC as "Task Desc",a.Action as "Action", a.TOOLS as "Tools",a.TARGET as "Target",a.UPPERLIMIT as "Upper Limit",a.LOWERLIMIT as "Lower Limit", a.REFERENCEMATERIAL as "Reference Material",a.RESPONSE as "Response",a.OPFLAG as "Up?", a.FREQDESC as "Frequency Description",a.ROUTEDESC as "Route Description",a.EQUIPCLASS as "Equipment Class", a.EQUIPTYPE as "Equipment Type" from reladmin.ecinspecttemp_dtl_vw a,reladmin.refequipment b,refSite c where a.equipclass = b.equipclass and b.siteid=c.siteid

data.name: sqlstandardinspectionExcel
data.value: SELECT distinct c.SiteName as "Facility",b.EquipmentID as "Functional Location",b.EquipmentDesc as "Equipment Description" , a.equipclass as "Equipment Class",a.equiptype as "Equipment Type",criticality as "Criticality", a.TASKDESC as "Task Description",a.Action as "Action",a.TOOLS as "Tools",a.TARGET as "Target", a.UPPERLIMIT as "Upper Limit", a.LOWERLIMIT as "Lower Limit",a.REFERENCEMATERIAL as "Reference Material", a.RESPONSE as "Response",a.OPFLAG as "UP?",a.FREQDESC as "Frequency Description", a.ROUTEDESC as "Route Description",ROUTETYPE as "Route Type",FREQCODE as "Frequency Code" from reladmin.ecinspecttemp_dtl_vw a,reladmin.refequipment b,refSite c where a.equipclass = b.equipclass and b.siteid=c.siteid and b.EquipmentID='{0}' and b.siteid='{1}'

data.name: sqlStandardTaskbyEquipClass
data.value: SELECT a.insptempnumber as INSPTASKID,a.TASKDESC,a.Action,a.TOOLS,a.TARGET,a.UPPERLIMIT,a.LOWERLIMIT,a.REFERENCEMATERIAL,a.RESPONSE,a.OPFLAG,a.FREQDESC,a.ROUTEDESC,a.EQUIPCLASS,a.EQUIPTYPE from reladmin.ecinspecttemp_dtl_vw a where EQUIPCLASS='{0}'

data.name: sqlStandardTemplates
data.value: SELECT a.insptempnumber as INSPTASKID,a.TASKDESC,a.Action,a.TOOLS,a.TARGET,a.UPPERLIMIT,a.LOWERLIMIT,a.REFERENCEMATERIAL,a.RESPONSE,a.OPFLAG,a.FREQDESC,a.ROUTEDESC,a.EQUIPCLASS,a.EQUIPTYPE from reladmin.ecinspecttemp_dtl_vw a,reladmin.refequipment b where a.equipclass = b.equipclass and b.equipmentid='{0}' and b.siteid='{1}'

data.name: sqlTaskDescription
data.value: select distinct Taskid,TASKDESC from RELADMIN.REFINSPECTIONTASK ORDER BY TASKDESC

data.name: sqlTasks
data.value: SELECT * from reladmin.ecinspecttemp_dtl_vw
